short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Print labels for all your Amazon shipping, using your own label printer!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Print FBA labels when and where you want from your Seller Central account or even when you're not logged into Amazon.

A free account must be created at LabelSavr.com
